connector.description: Send file to an FTP Server through Secure Copy Protocol

camel.kamelet.scp-sink.serverName.name: camel.kamelet.scp-sink.serverName
camel.kamelet.scp-sink.serverName.description: The hostname of the FTP server

camel.kamelet.scp-sink.serverPort.name: camel.kamelet.scp-sink.serverPort
camel.kamelet.scp-sink.serverPort.description: The port of the FTP server

camel.kamelet.scp-sink.privateKeyFile.name: camel.kamelet.scp-sink.privateKeyFile
camel.kamelet.scp-sink.privateKeyFile.description: Set the private key file so that the SFTP endpoint can do private key verification.

camel.kamelet.scp-sink.privateKeyPassphr.name: camel.kamelet.scp-sink.privateKeyPassphrase
camel.kamelet.scp-sink.privateKeyPassphr.description: Set the private key file passphrase so that the SFTP endpoint can do private key verification.

camel.kamelet.scp-sink.strictHostKeyChec.name: camel.kamelet.scp-sink.strictHostKeyChecking
camel.kamelet.scp-sink.strictHostKeyChec.description: Sets whether to use strict host key checking.

camel.kamelet.scp-sink.useUserKnownHosts.name: camel.kamelet.scp-sink.useUserKnownHostsFile
camel.kamelet.scp-sink.useUserKnownHosts.description: If knownHostFile has not been explicit configured then use the host file from System.getProperty(user.home)/.ssh/known_hosts.
